channel.title: vscode on Reboot and Shine
channel.description: Recent content in vscode on Reboot and Shine

item.title: Debugging Wine with LLDB and VSCode
item.description: In my previous post about Wine I mentioned working on a debugger that is capable of debugging both the Wine layer and the Windows application running with it. Time to share some details! Debugging Wine applications is tricky and there are different ways to do it. In many cases you don’t have access to the application source code and/or debug symbols and Wine itself is often built with aggressive optimizations.
